brainly_data.question: The assistance of the French was given to the American Continental Army after which battle in the Revolutionary War?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: The assistance of the French was given to the American Continental Army after which battle in the Revolutionary War?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The assistance was given after Cowpens.
